newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Banque Indosuez says takes over Fiba.
newsitem.headline: Banque Indosuez says takes over Fiba.

text.p: Banque Indosuez said on Tuesday that its subsidiary Cheuvreux de Virieu was taking over the equity brokerage business of Fiba Nordic Securities UK and Fiba Nordic Securities AB.
The bank said in a statement that the stockbroking team of Fiba, that was set up in 1994, will join the new Cheuvreux de Virieu subsidiaries in London and Stockholm.

"Thereby increasing its presence in the equity markets of northern Europe, Banque Indosuez is pursuing the implementation of the strategic plan agreed upon with its new shareholder, Credit Agricole," the bank said in a statement.
The transaction remains subject to the approval of the supervisory authorities in Sweden and Britain.
"Separately, and in the meantime, Fiba Nordic Securities in London and Stockholm will change its name to C.I. Nordic Securities," the statement said.
